content.body: Because it is a hard requirement from Jordan that the pipe operator be packaged with a call-this operator (because the pipe operator reached Stage 1 conditional on a bind/call-this operator also passing, all those years ago), I’m trying to sell the complementarity of pipe and call-this…
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Because it is a hard requirement from Jordan that the pipe operator be packaged with a call-this operator (because the pipe operator reached Stage 1 conditional on a bind/call-this operator also passing, all those years ago), I’m trying to sell the complementarity of pipe and call-this…
